channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The biographer of Franklin, Jobs and Musk zooms in on the 35 words that define America.
item.description: Walter Isaacson , the former media executive who has written a shelfful of magisterial biographies on Benjamin Franklin and other history-changers, wi...

item.title: Scoop: Ted Cruz sets stage for 2028 run with Tucker Carlson jabs

item.title: Trump takes affordability pitch to McDonald's
item.description: President Trump will dial up his affordability message for an audience of McDonald's owners, operators and suppliers Monday evening, as part of an esc...

item.title: AI's next big leap is models that understand the world.
item.description: Move over large language models — the new frontier in AI is world models that can understand and simulate reality. Why it matters: Models that can nav...

item.title: In a shift, Trump says House GOP should vote for Epstein files' release
item.description: President Trump said Sunday evening House Republicans "should vote to release the Epstein files, because we have nothing to hide, and it's time to mov...

item.title: In shift, Trump says House should vote to release Epstein files
item.description: Lawmakers pushing for the release of more files are planning a news conference at the Capitol on Tuesday alongside victims of convicted sex offender J...

item.title: Fight over abortion could doom Congress’s health care plans
item.description: Republicans are demanding a change to expiring ACA subsidies to strengthen abortion restrictions. Democrats say it’s a non-starter.

item.title: GOP plans to replace Obamacare have failed. Here’s what lawmakers propose now.
item.description: Lawmakers are racing toward a mid-December deadline, with Republicans hoping to present side-by-side legislation with Democrats’ plan to extend ACA su...

item.title: The two ends of the Capitol are worlds apart — as the founders intended
item.description: The shutdown fight showed the intended power struggle between the House and Senate.

item.title: GOP-led Epstein probe in House creates political friendly fire for Trump
item.description: The Republican side of the committee investigating Epstein has kept pushing out troves of emails and documents, and Trump’s name keeps coming up.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
